cause.description:
Since Zia's reign, maulvis have been constantly trying to get into the political system of the country. This has surpassed limits as they've started using innocent adolescents for their criminal activites...achieving political interests in the name of religion.
Say NO to MULLAHS and help our youth adopt a path of self-discovery through true knowledge of the Quran.
1. Do not vote for extremist political parties
cause.mission: Clear disillusioned minds of the innocent
cause.name: Say NO to MULLAHS!
